data.title: Last name TODT: origin and meaning
data.meta_description: Last Name : TODT, Learn more about the geographical origin and the etymology of this last name
data.text:
Origin

Todt : German: variant of Toth 2 and 3.

Dodt : German: variant of Todt.

Dotterweich : German: habitational name from a place in Württemberg named Todtenweis literally ‘meadow of the dead’ altered by folk etymology to Dotterweich literally ‘yolk soft’.

Toothaker : Altered form of Swiss German Totenacher a habitational name (recorded in Konstanz in the 14th century) for someone from Todtnacht in Thurgau Switzerland.

More

Source : DAFN2 : Dictionary of American Family Names 2nd edition, ©2022 by Patrick Hanks and Oxford University Press
